vote.text: Amendment SA 1411 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 29. Record Vote Number: 186.

action.text: Amendment SA 1411 proposed by Senator Hatch to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 1299. (consideration: CR S3052, S3053; text: CR S3052; text as modified: CR S3053) Of a perfecting nature.
